amendment.description: To extend the authorization for the Fort Peck Rural Water System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2961 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2961 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4334) To extend the authorization for the Fort Peck Rural Water System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2961 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2961 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2910.
